scripts.test:clean: rimraf ./test/tmp ./test/node_modules ./test/bundle.js ./test/package.json ./test/package-lock.json && cd test && mkdir node_modules && echo {} > package.json
scripts.pretest:webpack:1: npm run test:clean && cd test && npm i css-loader@0.14.0 raw-loader@0.5.1 testem@0.8.3 webpack@1 ./.. && "./node_modules/.bin/webpack" --config webpack@1.config.js
scripts.pretest:webpack:3: npm run test:clean && cd test && npm i css-loader raw-loader testem webpack@3 ./.. && "./node_modules/.bin/webpack" --config webpack@3.config.js
scripts.test: echo $browser && npm run test:webpack:3 && npm run test:webpack:1
